user_query: I'm organizing a family reunion and I need some jokes to entertain everyone. Fetch a specific manatee joke by its id and share it with me. Additionally, give me a few jokes from the API Ninjas Jokes API to keep the atmosphere light-hearted.

TaskList.description: Fetch a specific manatee joke by its ID from the designated jokes API.
Retrieve a few random jokes from the API Ninjas Jokes API to provide additional entertainment.
